description: {{ cookiecutter.namespace }}.{{ cookiecutter.collection_name }} provides Ansible playbooks, roles, and modules for ...
author: username@example.com

__prompts__.namespace: What namespace will this collection reside in?
__prompts__.collection_name: What should the collection be called?
__prompts__.description: Provide a short description of the collection's purpose
__prompts__.tag: Select a tag you want to associate with the collection for indexing/searching
__prompts__.scm_repository: Where will the collection's source code be published?
__prompts__.author: Provide an email address for the individual or team responsible for the collection's source code
__prompts__.requires_ansible_version: The version of Ansible required to use the collection. Multiple versions can be separated with a comma (e.g., '>=2.10.0,<2.15.0')
__prompts__.enable_antsibull_changelog: Would you like to enable antsibull-changelog support?
